title: Embarking on Your Financial Journey : A Beginner's Guide to Stock Market Success.

topic.title: What is share? What is share market?

content.value: 1 When we divide the capital of any company in small small equal parts. That single small part is called as Share For eg. - If there is a company named as InvestingIQ-Hub having capital of 1,000/- Rs. If we divide this in 100 equal parts with same ammount then single part cost 10Rs. This small part called as Share. ðŸ‘‰ If you have to know the total share capital of company -

formula: Total share capital = Total share of company x Share price

list.listItem: FII : Foreign Institutional Investor - These are the institutions invest in our financial market from outside of country which are registered or headquarterd.

DII : Domestic Institutional Investor - Institutions or group of investor who choose to invest in financial market within the country where they live. These investement decisions are impacted by both political and economic trends.
You will get more time, if you know very well about making profit.
This business doesn't need proper place or office. You just need your Laptop or Mobile.
NSE : It is a nifty index. It contains 50 big market cap stocks, also called as NIFTY-50.
BSE : BSE is a Sensex. It contain 30 big market cap stocks.
